functionalities.name: Legal Assistance
functionalities.description: Provides legal assistance and advice on various legal matters.
usage_examples: What are my rights in a child custody case?
How can I terminate parental rights?
What are the steps to file for divorce?
Can you explain property laws related to inheritance?

functionalities.name: Case Research
functionalities.description: Performs research on legal cases and provides relevant information and precedents.
usage_examples: What are the landmark Supreme Court cases on freedom of speech?
Find appellate court decisions on child custody disputes.
Provide information on notable criminal law cases in New Mexico.
What are the key rulings in property law cases?

functionalities.name: Legal Definitions
functionalities.description: Provides definitions and explanations of legal terms and concepts.
usage_examples: What is the definition of jurisdiction?
Explain the concept of tort law.
What does 'beyond a reasonable doubt' mean in criminal law?
Can you clarify the principle of 'stare decisis'?

functionalities.name: Legal Procedures
functionalities.description: Guides users through legal procedures and explains the steps involved.
usage_examples: What is the process for filing a lawsuit?
Explain the steps in the probate process.
How does the appeals process work?
What are the requirements for adopting a child?

functionalities.name: Legal Resources
functionalities.description: Provides access to legal resources such as statutes, regulations, and court opinions.
usage_examples: Find the New Mexico statutes on child support.
Provide the latest court opinions on employment discrimination.
Where can I find the regulations related to environmental protection?
What are the legal resources for property law in Albuquerque?
